home.title: Welcome to MCP Dockmaster
home.install_error: Failed to open installation page for {{toolName}}
home.install_success: {{mcpClientApp}} installed successfully! Please restart {{mcpClientApp}} to apply the changes.
home.mcp_description: MCP is an open-source standard from Anthropic that helps AI apps like Claude Desktop or Cursor easily access data from platforms such as Slack and Google Drive, interact with other applications, and connect to APIs.

environment.title: Environment Details
environment.description: Make sure that you have Node.js, Python, and Docker installed so you can run MCPs.

integration.title: Integration Details
integration.description: Add Dockmaster to Cursor, Claude Desktop, or any other MCP client.
integration.other_description: Add MCP Dockmaster to any other app that supports MCP Servers of type command:

registry.title: Registry Details
registry.description: Browse available MCPs from the registry to extend your AI applications with various capabilities.

restart.title: Restart Options
restart.description: Restart your MCP clients to apply the changes and start using your MCPs.
